channel.title: [PI] Magic issues Will +rep
channel.description: ok well im using a 317 Pi and whenever you mage somebody in wildy, you run up to them instead of standing in ur position ( So basically theres no farcasting). How do i change it so if you barrage somebody from a distance ; you stay in the same spot?
